PROJECT (PerceptualDiff)
SET(DIFF_SRC PerceptualDiff.cpp LPyramid.cpp RGBAImage.cpp
CompareArgs.cpp Metric.cpp)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${AQSIS_TIFF_INCLUDE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${AQSIS_ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR})


ADD_EXECUTABLE (pdiff ${DIFF_SRC})

SET(LINKLIBS ${AQSIS_TIFF_LIBRARIES} ${AQSIS_ZLIB_LIBRARIES})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(pdiff ${LINKLIBS})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(pdiff PROPERTIES INSTALL_RPATH "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${RENDERENGINEDIR}")

INSTALL(TARGETS pdiff
        RUNTIME DESTINATION ${BINDIR})
